scripts.dev:pr: gh pr create --draft --title 'WIP: Auto-generated PR' --body 'Auto-generated pull request'
scripts.dev:setup: npm run dev:branch && npm run dev:commit
scripts.git:update: git checkout main && git pull origin main
scripts.git:clean: git branch --merged main | grep -v main | xargs -n 1 git branch -d
scripts.quality:check: docker-compose exec web bundle exec rubocop && docker-compose exec web bundle exec rspec
scripts.security:scan: docker-compose exec web bundle exec brakeman --no-pager
